transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Yes.
Customer: Sat Sri Akal, madam.
Executive: Kaun?
Customer: Main Vibha Singh baat kar rahi hun.
Executive: Boliye, boliye.
Customer: Sir aap 969 pe call kiya tha.
Executive: Haan, aapka phone aa gaya. ₹500 ka loss aapka phone aaya aur.
Customer: Sir loss maine thodi kiya hai sir, aapke phone karne se mera loss ho gaya.
Executive: Phone nahi to kara diya.
Customer: Main share kiya tha, bech raha tha, IPO lag gaya tha, aapka beech mein phone aa gaya, TPIN generate kar raha tha, saara khatam ho gaya. ₹500 price kam ho gaya uska.
Executive: To sir mera aapne 969 pe call kiya tha tabhi to main aapko call kar rahi hun sir.
Customer: Koi nahi, waise hi bata raha hun.
Executive: Sir aapne 969 number pe call kyun kiya tha, main ye puch rahi hun.
Customer: Plastic pet ka scrap chahiye mujhe, 110 ton ki requirement hai to main uska seller ka contact number dhund raha hun.
Executive: To sir 969 pe call karenge na sir direct wo mere paas IndiaMART ke kisi bhi number se.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Sir aap IndiaMART ke kisi bhi number pe call karoge mere paas hi aapka phone aayega.
Customer: To aapke paas mera number hai to aap direct mere pe hi call kariye.
Executive: To mujhe nahi malum tha, aisa malum hi nahi tha na.
Executive: Achha, to ab malum ho gaya na sir aap agar 969 pe bhi call karenge ya kisi bhi call karenge na to wo direct mere paas hi aayega.
Customer: Wo baat sab chhodo madam abhi mujhe plastic pet scrap wale ka koi contact karao na usko bulao na mujhe call kare.
Executive: Sir buyer ko main.
Customer: Plastic pet bottle scrap buyer main hi khud hun mujhe khud hi chahiye.
Executive: Aapko product chahiye.
Customer: Mere ko product chahiye plastic pet bottle scrap 100 ton urgent requirement.
Executive: Ek second to aap IndiaMART ki website pe jao.
Customer: Maine sab try kar liya koi phone nahi utha raha nahi.
Executive: Buyer seller phone nahi utha rahe aapka sir?
Customer: Wahi to baat hai dekho na maine kitne ka call kiya kuch dikhai de raha hoga usme.
Executive: Wo aapke seller ke buyer pe kiya aap khud buyer ban sakte hain to mere ko nahi show ho raha hai na sir.
Executive: Ek second.
Executive: Aapko is product ka number pata hai kya naam hai sir? Kaunsa plastic aapne bataya?
Customer: Pet bottle scrap.
Executive: Aapka aawaz na clear nahi aa raha mujhe samajh nahi aa raha.
Customer: Plastic pet bottle scrap.
Executive: Pet bottle.
Customer: Pet bottle P E T bottle scrap.
Customer: Jaldi karo thoda.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Nani tape pan nathi malti j nathi.
Customer: Nathi malti nani tape.
Executive: Aapko aapko bas yahi matlab product chahiye isiliye aapne call kiya tha na aur koi concern to nahi tha na aapka?
Customer: Nahi nahi ye confirm hai mujhe ye product chahiye chahiye.
Executive: To aap na aapka jabhi matlab jabhi tha aapne 969 pe call kiya to mere ek complaint ho gaya hai to usko close karna padega to uske regarding us concern ko to main close kar sakti hun na.
Customer: Tape nathi tape nathi.
Customer: [unintelligible]
Customer: Nahi madam mujhe wo chahiye plastic pet scrap bottle aap mujhe seller.
Executive: Sir sun lo sir main seller aapko de rahi hun but main aapse ye puch rahi hun aapne 969 pe bas isi regarding call kiya tha na mujhe is product ka seller chahiye.
Customer: Haan bas bas isi liye isi regarding maine call nahi kiya tha apne aap isme se lag gaya seller ne nahi uthaya to kisi aur ko phone laga tha IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hun main aapko help karte hue kar sakte hain maine bola phone rakho kuch nahi hai kaat diya.
Executive: Are sir to aapko batana tha ki agar direct mujhe call karte to isi regarding.
Customer: Nahi malum tha na abhi aap mujhe thoda wo mujhe seller do na thoda busy hun.
Executive: Okay theek hai main seller de rahi hun lekin mera sun lijiye ek baat suniye aapko bas concern itna tha ki aapko seller chahiye main seller de dungi to iske khilaf mera na ek complaint ho gaya kyunki aapne 969 pe call kiya us concern ko to main close kar sakti hun na.
Customer: Haan close kar do no problem.
Executive: Haan theek hai.
Customer: Mujhe urgently seller do usko seller ko bolo mujhe contact kare.
Executive: Sir main search karke de rahi hun bas na aap na mujhe na kya kehte hain ki uska ek feedback jaega to usko satisfied mark kar dijiyega apne according yes mark kar dijiyega case.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay achha achha.
Executive: Ek second sir main aapko seller ka number aapke WhatsApp pe send kar du ya phir aapko main search karke WhatsApp pe send karu number send karo aur aap jo bhi hoga baat kar lijiyega ek baar.
Customer: Okay okay okay okay okay.
Executive: Main check kar rahi hun.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs plastic pet bottle scrap urgently.

- Executive needs to close a complaint regarding call.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to provide seller contact.

- Executive requested customer to mark feedback as satisfied.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will send seller's number on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- seller, plastic, pet bottle, scrap, complaint, feedback
